reviews.review: Fun
çok iyi oyun bundan önce friday 13th game almıştım ona bin basar oyuncu sayısıda iyi hemen maç buluyo

Ich bin neu hier, kenne aber ein ähnliches Spiel vom Handy.
Mir gefällt es sehr, doch wie so viele, finde auch ich das Matchmaking nicht so berauschend...
Allerdings habe ich weniger ein problem damit gegen/mit deutlich erfahreneren Leuten in ein Match zu kommen, sondern ist es eher das Spiel gegen/mit Gruppen, die teilweise im Gleichen Sprachchat sind!
Ich kenne das noch von Dota 2 und stand dort auch schon oft allein im team, weil der rest der Gruppe mich liegen lassen hat. Hier nicht anders!
Gebt mir das Matchmaking total ohne Balance, dafür mit der Möglichkeit Gruppen zu ignorieren. 

In der Hölle landest du schließlich auch allein und musst dich arrangieren!

DEVS PETES DEL ORTO.
Уникальный в своем роде, интереснее доты и хардкорнее батллроялей в плане "Остаться в живых".

Dead by Daylight hat seine ganz eigenen Macken und seinen ganz eigenen Charme. Es spielt immer ein Killer gegen 4 Survivor, was regelmäßig Balacingprobleme macht. Trotzdem hat Dead by Daylight gute Mechaniken, bei denen auch der Grusel- und Gorefaktor relativ schnell in den Hintergrund treten und das mehr als gute Gameplay zum Vorschein kommt. Alles in Allem eine klare Empfehlung (wie man an den 700+ Spielstunden wohl eh auch sieht :) ).

Its not for everyone, I will certainly admit that. But I love it. 

I mostly main killer, though I have played survivor recently. For killer, you have to hunt down a group of 4 survivors, each with unique perks and items. There are many strategies for you to take to take them out, and keep in mind that they are ALL VIABLE. Don't let survivors tell you otherwise, because its often the entitled players saying that. But also keep in mind the strategies such as face camping (standing in front of a hooked survivor and not leaving to hunt for more) will cause you to miss out on points. Killing survivors doesn't matter so long as you can farm those sweet sweet blood points from them.

As for survivor, the killer has many perks and addons for their special abilities. There are stealth killers who you will have little to no warning of their approach. Some teleport. Some infect you. Some just bloody shank ya for the fun of it and leave you on the ground. In the end, teamwork or selfishness is what will allow you to survive this sadistic hunt. I would recommend getting some friends and playing with them in a call or something, as playing solo-que sucks. Either you get someone selfish who you cannot talk to. Or people who WANT to help, but do things in all the wrong ways. Honestly, they should really have a survivor communication system. Like a radio addon for all items or something. Because it sucks when you cannot communicate and plan things out.

In the end though, its a fun game. You just gotta do what you can to enjoy yourself. Find your playstyle, jump into a match, and do as you like. On one last note, this game isn't much of a horror game. Mostly due to the fact that you KNOW its a player hunting you. And that its in 3rd person for the survivors. Maybe if they made a vr mode? I am sure it would be much more scary if they did make it vr!

Oyun bence alanında en iyisi. Bir katil ve dört survivor arasında geçiyor.
Her Katilin kendine has güçleri var ve korku filmlerindeki çoğu katile bu oyunda rastlayabilirsiniz bu güzel bir şey.
Lakin oyuna yeni başlayanları adapte etmek adına zaten dengeli olan bir çok perk, item ve addona gelen değişiklikler bu oyuna yüzlerce saatini vermiş oyuncuları soğutuyor ve oyunun eski tadı yok. Bütün perkler survivor ve killerda nerfleniyor. Daha sonra seri şekilde jeneratör yapılmaya dönüyor oyun. Daha sonra yeni bir katil geliyor veya eskilerden biri reworkleniyor katiller çok güçlü oluyor. Oyunda eskiden bir denge vardı ama şu an oyuna girdiğinizde bu dengesizlikten dolayı oyunda ya survivorlar gen rusha gidiyor ya da katil camp veya tunnel yapıyor. Eskiden eğleneceli bir oyundu ama şimdi oynarsanız illa ki sinir olarak kalkarsınız.

Düzeltme: Artık Survivorlar çok güçlü olduğu için oyun ya gen rush'a gidiyor ya da  Killerlar camp ve tunnel atıyor :D
